data.eml:eml: Two new species of Megophrys Kuhl & van Hasselt (Amphibia: Megophryidae), from western Thailand and southern Cambodia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mahony, Stephen (2011): Two new species of Megophrys Kuhl & van Hasselt (Amphibia: Megophryidae), from western Thailand and southern Cambodia. Zootaxa 2734: 23-39, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.276566
